title: The 2017 Contenders Announcement With Tony & Carson Serino
itunes:title: The 2017 Contenders Announcement With Tony & Carson Serino
description:
You are our brothers and sisters and we are looking out for you, taking care of you, just a little bit so you won’t have to spend your money, forget about them bums, these are the Contenders for Cigar of the Year. Over the next two hours we will take you on a journey and let you know the 8 nominees, and inform you how you can cast your vote for Cigar of the Year.

In the first hour, we will light up the first nominee for cigar of the year, and in the 2nd hour we will light up The Wayfarer from Serino Cigars with brand owners Tony & Carson Serino who will be sitting in with us as we unveil the list from which Cigar of the Year will be chosen!

All that and the usual bag of tricks Debonaire Mr. J, Asylum Barry, Cigar News and a Classic 3 Way.

The Cigar Authority is a member of the United Podcast Network and is recorded live in front of a studio audience at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe upstairs at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH and as always you can find many of the cigars we discuss at http://www.2GuysCigars.com/.
